title: Implement Widget Controls and Empty States
description:
Create widget hover/focus controls (remove, edit, resize) and dashboard empty states to guide users.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. Remove button appears on widget hover/focus with clear visual feedback
2. Edit button for widget configuration (if applicable)
3. Resize handles for widget size adjustment (small, medium, large)
4. Empty state message when dashboard has no widgets
5. Call-to-action button in empty state to open widget library
6. Accessible controls with keyboard support
7. Smooth transitions for control visibility
